dcterms:description: RetailRocket dataset is collected from a real-world e-commerce website, where sequential data of userâ€™s behaviour of viewing and adding items to a shopping cart is recorded. For simplicity, views and adding to a cart are regarded as clicks and purchases. We remove the items which are interacted by the user less than 3 times. Sequences whose length is shorter than 3 are also removed. There are 1,176,680 clicks and 57,269 purchases over 70,852 items in the processed dataset.
dcterms:title: RetailRocket

dcterms:creator: Minmin Chen

dcterms:description: Yoochoose dataset is from RecSys Challenge 2015. Each user-item interaction session consists of a sequence of user clicks or purchases. We remove sessions that are shorter than 3 items. We randomly sample from the 200k sessions to obtain a dataset containing 1,110,965 clicks and 43,946 purchases upon 26,702 items.
dcterms:title: Yoochoose
